name: Chronostasis
modifiers: Your melee skills consume up to (500 to 2000) ward, gaining +1 melee damage per 10 ward consumedDual wielding this weapon will not provide this benefit twice, but it will raise the maximum ward you can consume for additional damage
lore: It's the missing beat, the spurious tick of a broken clock, the jolt of sudden realization. As we swing this timeless artifact like frenzied apes, minds future and past laugh at our ignorance.
